attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the workingmens clubs were established for the working man to have a drink smoke and to be entertained after a weeks work,their rights have been taken away,clubs should at the very least be allowed to vote on wether to be smoking or non smoking but have not even been given the option,now the out come is clubs and pubs closing every week with massive loss of jobs with a knock on effect to other trades as well,we appeal to the prime minister to give them the right to vote on their own clubs pubs etc if they want to allow it or not.you have not solved the problem just moved it into the streets when people want to smoke,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
